memberdef.type: std::map< uint16_t, std::function< void(uint8_t, uint8_t, uint8_t)> >
memberdef.name: touch_callbacks

briefdescription.para: Constructor for the ESPMegaDisplay class.

parameterdescription.para: The serial adapter connected to the display.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the display.
The main loop function of the display.
Restarts the display.
Sets the brightness of the display.
Sets the volume of the display.
Jumps to the specified page on the display.

parameterdescription.para: The page number to jump to.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of a string component on the display.
Sets the value of a number component on the display.
Gets the value of a string component from the display.

simplesect.para: This function is blocking.
If the display does not respond or is not connected, this function will block for up to DISPLAY_FETCH_RETRY_COUNT * DISPLAY_FETCH_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
The value of the string component.
The returned char array must be freed after use.

briefdescription.para: Gets the value of a number component from the display and stores it in a buffer.

simplesect.para: This function is blocking.
If the display does not respond or is not connected, this function will block for up to DISPLAY_FETCH_RETRY_COUNT * DISPLAY_FETCH_TIMEOUT milliseconds.

parameterdescription.para: The buffer to store the value.

simplesect.para: True if the value is successfully stored in the buffer, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Gets the value of a number component from the display.

simplesect.para: This function is blocking.
If the display does not respond or is not connected, this function will block for up to DISPLAY_FETCH_RETRY_COUNT * DISPLAY_FETCH_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
The value of the number component.

briefdescription.para: Registers a callback function for touch events.

simplesect.para: The handle of the callback function.

briefdescription.para: Unregisters a callback function for touch events.

parameterdescription.para: The handle of the callback function.

briefdescription.para: Registers a callback function for page change events.

simplesect.para: The handle of the callback function.

briefdescription.para: Unregisters a callback function for page change events.

parameterdescription.para: The handle of the callback function.

briefdescription.para: Receives and processes serial commands from the display adapter.

simplesect.para: True if data is received, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Receives and processes serial commands from the display adapter.

parameterdescription.para: Flag indicating whether to process the received commands.

simplesect.para: True if data is received, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Processes the received serial command.

simplesect.para: This function interacts directly with the rx_buffer.

briefdescription.para: Processes the touch event payload.

simplesect.para: This function interacts directly with the rx_buffer.

briefdescription.para: Processes the page report event payload.

simplesect.para: This function interacts directly with the rx_buffer.

briefdescription.para: Sends stop bytes to the display adapter.
Sends a command to the display adapter.
Checks if the received payload is valid.

simplesect.para: True if the payload is valid, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Waits for a valid payload from the display adapter.

simplesect.para: True if a valid payload is received, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: The ESPMegaDisplay class is a class for controlling the ESPMegaDisplay.

simplesect.para: The ESPMegaDisplay is a UART controlled display.
Connect the Display's TX pin to the ESPMega's RX pin and the Display's RX pin to the ESPMega's TX pin.
